alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 8:42PM MST until January 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...El Paso County, especially east of the I-25 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light glaze of ice and slick conditions are possible, especially on bridges, elevated surfaces, and lesser used side roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
